name: Techniques Table 400
descr:
The IL Model stationary table is ideal for any practitioner that only needs standard features. The height of the table can manually be set to the height that best suites each individuals needs. Choose from a variety of table tops.

Standard Features

    21" wide adjusting surface
    Choice of stationary table height (18" up to 30") Height can be adjusted manually
    Multidirectional head piece (elevation and tilt)
    Ankle rest extension
    Leveling floor glides
    Sturdy steel construction
    Wide assortment of colours in health care grade upholstery
    Table is fully up gradable at any time, up grades simply bolt on

Options

    Cervical drop section
    Upper Thoracic drop section
    Thoracic elevating drop section
    Thoracic drop section (drop only)
    Lumbar elevating drop section
    Lumbar drop section (drop only)
    Side extensions (4 cushions)
 
Table can also be custom made to specific needs (call for details)
 
Shown price is basic price and without any options.
